item.description:
Sorry. Meetup.com keeps the info from the old Meet up for the next Meet Up. I tried to book the gospel brunch at Dick's Last Resort for the next Meet Up, but it's not clear whether they still serve the gospel brunch. With that said, I am going with a second choice of Bob's Southern Bistro for the next outing.

On their menu:
Cheese Grits
Bacon
Homemade Biscuits
Homemade Baked Mac & Cheese
Fried Chicken
BBQ Spare Ribs
Turkey & Ham Rotation
Candied Yams
White Rice
Collard Greens
Black Eyed Peas (seasoned with Smoked Turkey)
New Orleans Style Red Beans (seasoned with Smoked Turkey)

I hope this is ok. They also have live music. Hope you can all attend.

Em
item.name: The Cambridge Ex-Southerners November Meetup
